outline:
1. east, antiquity, front, that which is before, aforetime
    1. front, from the front or east, in front, mount of the East
    2. ancient time, aforetime, ancient, from of old, earliest time
    3. anciently, of old (adverb)
    4. beginning
    5. east
  2. eastward, to or toward the East
kjv_def: aforetime, ancient (time), before, east (end, part, side, -ward), eternal, [idiom] ever(-lasting), forward, old, past. Compare H6926 (קִדְמָה).
strongs_def: the front, of place (absolutely, the fore part, relatively the East) or time (antiquity); often used adverbially (before, anciently, eastward)
